item.title: Photo: Igor Mukhin
item.description: “I felt that the time of ‘change’ had come, and I needed to go and shoot” ( Flashbak , 2018). To start: explore Igor Mukhin’s work in the series Смотри в тишине (Look in silence). Presented by MAMM (= Multimedia Art Museum, Moscow).

item.title: Photography: Sergei Lobovikov
item.description: Портреты крестьян, крестьянский быт / Portraits of peasants, peasant life – 1900 (Nigel Fowler Sutton, 2018, 4 m) Русские фотографы. Сергей Лобовиков. Sergey Lobovikov – Photography (Serge Bogdanov, 2016, 8 m) “Светопись сердцем”. Фильм о фотографе Сергее Лобовикове.

item.title: Photo: Gosha Bergal
item.description: Salarjevo Саларьево (Salarjevo) is (besides being a metro station in Moscow ) a photo project by Bergal. You can view it on Issuu (2020) – definitely worth checking out. More photos on Mdfschool.ru (2019). Reportage Bergal also ventures into current affairs.

item.title: Photo: Aleksey Myakishev
item.description: Kolodozero The photographer did something similar (between 2011 and 2015) in Kolodozero (Колодозеро), a village in Karelia where in winter you’re more likely to see snow than people. Images from the series can be seen on Photoshelter and Viewbook , with slides and commentary on Vimeo (1 min).
